To reduce the infant mortality rate from 130 per 1000
livebirths in 1996 to 70 per 1000 live births by theyear 2000.
To reduce nutritional anaemia by 50 per cent from
1996 levels by the year 2000.
To increase prenatal coverage (at least four visits per
woman) from 40 per cent in 1996 to 80 per cent bythe year 2000.
Operational targets based on the objectives should be
identified.
